document.heading: New Town Boundary Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-292, the “New Town Boundary Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-931 which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 7, 2008, and November 18, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 8, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-579 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-292 became effective on March 20, 2009.
